acf.welcome_intro: Hello, I’m Robb Bennett. I am a designer & developer. I specialize in working with top-notch creative agencies to transform designs into beautiful modern websites. And, I grow bonsai.

expertise_block_1.call_out_title: Development with an eye for beauty.
expertise_block_1.content: V23 possesses the rare ability to translate excellent creative work into beautifully rich, pixel-perfect, web experiences — making us the ideal partner for designers and creative agencies.
expertise_block_1.title: Visual Thinking

expertise_block_2.content: Expertly crafted jQuery and CSS allows V23 to deliver amazing and blazing-fast sites. Though your users will be delighted, the underpinnings of the site are where the real beauty is (haha, according to us code nerds, anyway).
expertise_block_2.title: Seamless Design/Development

expertise_block_3.call_out_title: Grow with the world’s best CMS.
expertise_block_3.content: Each site is ultimately served up via WordPress.org, the most widely-used content management system available, meaning that after launch, you (or your client) can grow, evolve and maintain the site’s content.
expertise_block_3.title: Powered by WordPress

testimonials.comment: “Robb is one of the most talented programmers we’ve ever worked with. He tackles complex interactive components — games, animations, maps, and more — with ease. He’s a total whiz at translating our designs. Whether we hand him a super-creative custom design or a clean corporate layout, he’ll translate it into a speedy, high-functioning website on schedule and on budget. His easy-to-use dashboards make it easy for our clients to take charge of their own digital assets. Robb is also a dream to work with — a real pro, and an amazing human being.”

“This is another one that Visual23 was extremely easy to work with. Despite a tight timeline, all the site development flowed perfectly. I am super pleased with the final product. The extra details and CSS animations that Robb added work so well with the design and this new site definitely increased traffic and conversion rates.”
